ygData.subject: RE: Do I ever have a chance at making high level?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not a hell level?  How long has it taken you to reach 51?  Ok, since I am talking totally out of hearsay, rumor and second hand info (ie my highest level
ygData.messageBody:
Not a hell level? How long has it taken you to reach 51? <eg> Ok, since I
am talking totally out of hearsay, rumor and second hand info (ie my highest
level made is only 40), I been told it's really hard to gain xp (all greens,
or hard stuff) and have also heard it called 'it's the level of nothing to
do.' My 50 fiends say "no reason to play sonso unless going on a good
raid..."

And yet I see others going to same places Lguk, SolB and shouting for
groups. So my comment on 50 being ultimate hell was more about that stuff
than the rate that you gain xp - although I was told its pretty boring to
build xp at 50.

I'd love to hear from you (all you 50's) more about what it's really like.

Sylly
Bardic 40th level - 2 dot 5 bubs to go

-----Original Message-----
From: Dark [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 29, 1999 8:01 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Do I ever have a chance at
making high level?

From: "Dark" <jackal@...>

One comment since when is 50 a hell level? 45 is the ultimat
hell level not
50.

Naeeldar
